findings.title: `msg.sender` is erroneously used instead of `_sender`
findings.description: The `canForward` function can be called by other contracts or a frontend to check if a user can forward an action. In case of these calls `msg.sender` wouldn't correspond to `_sender` yielding a logically incorrect result.

findings.title: Possible reentrant call
findings.description: Since `lastVoteTimes` is modified after the call to `runScript`, it may lead to a reentrant call.

findings.title: Unchecked Input Values in Initialize Function
findings.description: Input values `minTime`, `minBalance` are not checked in the `initialize` function.

findings.title: Integer literals representing time period are not accurate
findings.description: Using integer literals to represent time periods can lead to inaccuracies. It is recommended to use time units (e.g., 365 days, 14 days) instead.

findings.title: Solidity constants are not optimized
findings.description: Solidity constants work like pure functions and are executed upon each access, suggesting to use a specific snippet instead.

findings.title: No Voting Power Calculation
findings.description: There is no voting power calculation directly in the `BalanceTimeForwarder` contract

findings.title: Incorrect Comment and Unnecessary Blacklist
findings.description: The comment copied from TokenManager has an incorrect second line and the blacklist may not be necessary.
